board.name: au50dd
board.display_name: Alveo U50DD Data Center Accelerator Card

image.name: au50dd_image.jpg
image.display_name: Alveo U50 Data Center Accelerator Card
image.description: Alveo U50 Data Center Accelerator Card

board.description: Alveo U50 Data Center Accelerator Card

interface.name: sfpdd1_1x_sfpdd2_1x
interface.description: 2-lane GT interface over SFPDD1 and SFPDD2

interface.name: sfpdd1_2x_sfpdd2_2x
interface.description: 4-lane GT interface over SFPDD1 and SFPDD2

component.name: sfpdd_leds
component.description: Status LEDs, 5-3 are for SFP-DD1 and 2-0 are for SFP-DD0 in the order [STATUS_LEDY,STATUS_LEDG,ACTIVITY_LED]

component.name: rs232_fpga_msp
component.description: SC-to-UART Bridge, which allows serial communication to SC

component.name: msp_gpio
component.display_name: GPIO between the SC and the CMC
component.description: GPIO between the SC and the CMC

component.name: sfpdd_refclk0
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 161 MHz oscillator used as a GT reference clock on the board

component.name: sfpdd_refclk1
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 322 MHz oscillator used as a GT reference clock on the board

component.name: cmc_clk
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 100 MHz oscillator used as CMC differential clock on the board

component.name: hbm_clk
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 100 MHz oscillator used as HBM differential clock on the board

component.name: pcie_refclk
component.description: Clock input from PCI Express edge connector
